tiles.title: Human Hand Gripping a Ski Pole

text: Students will begin Module 2 by examining how sensory input impacts our ability to move and interact with objects.
A 30 cm ruler and thick winter gloves (ski gloves) will be needed for each pair of students.

Students develop a model in which they describe the relationship “between components, including: (1) The functions of at least two major body systems in terms of contributions to overall function of an organism and (2) Ways the functions of the two different systems affect one another; and (3) A system’s function and how that relates both to the system’s parts and th overall function of the organism.” (HS-LS1-2)
